Two friends exchanged secret messages using RSA, but accidentally reused a prime in their public keys. Can you recover the message? Ciphertext: 2404171162815276764803730455593225503767279405336069363887982502844740485487399700612370866044034708812236582164345668519113944048235946192053060430595657

The flag format is flag{...}
n=6991814489947934195979451267604699119707493799351035186010869882402149928058638329734372584945310880138361797907445671545439952087951098405081593691639219, n2=4491934678075821694551516610278765693726061359043897528162846395456658827931450770603823307803640448798062057807500312133555657629141733973348745838170511, e=474479790399535546278699935583954465702124388023493512524551868157901197460989854652339443915545390439626675395052203247599525267185669613591538274439039

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{nu909zue}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 2404171162815276764803730455593225503767279405336069363887982502844740485487399700612370866044034708812236582164345668519113944048235946192053060430595657
vulnerability: shared prime
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common prime, computing GCD(n, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=6991814489947934195979451267604699119707493799351035186010869882402149928058638329734372584945310880138361797907445671545439952087951098405081593691639219, n2=4491934678075821694551516610278765693726061359043897528162846395456658827931450770603823307803640448798062057807500312133555657629141733973348745838170511, e=474479790399535546278699935583954465702124388023493512524551868157901197460989854652339443915545390439626675395052203247599525267185669613591538274439039
extra_info: p=74227833265903825247299413241044064835649983313186343320661906583838127562093, q=94193972561497202493277464432262517132849836483074071580073852027662023623583, q2=60515503153440003014594397210199038277967916687914849967137066173228918258027, φ(n)=6991814489947934195979451267604699119707493799351035186010869882402149928058469907928545183917570303260688491325477171725643691673050362646470093540453544, φ(n2)=4491934678075821694551516610278765693726061359043897528162846395456658827931316027267403963975378554987610814704386694233554556435853935000591678792350392
